roleset.name: alter badly
roleset.note: DISTORT-V NOTES: Maybe an instrumental arg? (from distort.01-v)
DISTORTED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from distorted.01-j)

example.name: passive
example.text: Instead, a spokesman blames the dismal third-quarter showing on ``an environment that *trace*-1 is being distorted *trace*-1 by a very harsh climate for sales of durable goods,'' which account for roughly two-thirds of Sears's annual merchandise volume.
example.arg: by a very harsh climate for sales of durable goods, ''which account for roughly two-thirds of Sears's annual merchandise volume

example.name: active
example.text: The media, she says, have distorted his personal life.

example.name: adjective usage, with CXN
example.src: BOLT P01, parts 2,3What is so distorted in their fundamental makeup that they can see this desecration of science and ignore it ?
example.text: What-2 *T*-2 is so distorted ICH-1 in their fundamental makeup [that they can see this desecration of science and ignore it]-1 ?
